content: ***find this pattern as a free download on hobbii com*** **size** one size **measurements** 20 cm 7 8 from cast on sts to cast off edge 68 cm 26 8 width at cast off edge **pattern information** this versatile pattern can be a bandana or scarf and you can make it wider if you want it s worked from the bottom edge and grows with increases on both the right and wrong sides to add to the ethereal look of the kid silk simple yarn overs are worked and beads are knit into the piece while you work it it s a pattern for confident beginners who want to learn new techniques such as lace increases and a stretchy bind off
